search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Rev (rev.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Rev can be found at: [https://www.rev.com/pricing](https://www.rev.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing for Caption, Transcription, and VoiceHub Services | Rev

extracted_content.content:
Free
----

Best for getting started with Rev  
for free

Features:

45 minutes of AI transcription per month6x more! Get 300 minutes now – offer ends soon!

Access to pay-per-minute 99% accurate human transcripts, captions, and subtitles

AI Notetaker for Google, Teams, and Zoom

Rev Mobile App for recording and editing on the go

Interactive transcript editor

Basic
-----

Built for productivity in individuals and small teams

Features

20 hours of AI transcription per month; 90 minutes per recording

3% discount on 99% accurate human transcripts, caption, and subtitlesUpgrade to human transcripts or captions for $1.93/min (reg price $1.99) or global subtitles for $6.30 to $15.51 (reg price $6.49 to $15.99)

AI Notetaker for Google, Teams, and Zoom

Rev Mobile App for recording and editing on the go

Interactive transcript editor

Unlimited use of AI Assistant & AI Summary Templates

Recommended

Pro
---

Built for larger teams who need advanced features and collaboration

Features

100 hours of AI transcription per month; no limit on file length

AI captions in 37+ languages included in 100 monthly hours

5% discount on 99% accurate human transcripts, caption, and subtitlesUpgrade to human transcripts or captions for $1.89/min (reg price $1.99) or global subtitles for $6.17 to $15.19 (reg price $6.49 to $15.99)

AI Notetaker for Google, Teams, and Zoom

Rev Mobile App for recording and editing on the go

Interactive transcript editor

Human Transcription
-------------------

Our expert transcriptionists turn speech to text in 12 hours or less, 99% accuracy guaranteed.

$1.99 /minute

What's included:

99% accuracy, fully formatted with timestamps in 12 hours or less

Free audio recording on Rev’s mobile app

Customize and edit your transcripts in our interactive editor

Automatically integrates with Dropbox

Transcribe video and audio to text in minutes with AI-powered automatic speech recognition.

$0.25 /minute

What's included:

95%+ accuracy in five minutes or less

Available in 37 languages coming soon

Free audio recording on Rev’s mobile app

Customize and edit your transcripts in our interactive editor

Automatically integrates with Dropbox

Human Captions
--------------

Reach a wider audience with human-generated captions in English or Spanish.

Starting at

$1.99 /minute

What's included:

99% accuracy in 12 hours or less

Free audio recording on Rev’s mobile app

FCC and ADA compliant in all major file formats

Customize and edit your captions in our interactive editor

Automatically integrates with YouTube, Vimeo, Zoom, Dropbox, and Google Drive

AI Captions
-----------

Boost your engagement by adding AI generated captions in 38 languages.

Price

$0.25 /minute

What's included:

95%+ accuracy in five minutes or less

Available in 37 languages coming soon

Download caption files in all major formats

Customize and edit your captions in our interactive editor

Automatically integrates with YouTube, Vimeo, Zoom, Dropbox, and Google Drive

Global Subtitles
----------------

Create globally accessible videos with fluent, human-translated subtitles in 17 languages.

$6.49 to $15.99 /minute

What's included:

Translated subtitles by fluent speakers in 17 languages

99% accuracy in 48 hours or less

Download files in all major formats with free English captions

Customize and edit your subtitles in our interactive editor

Automatic integration with YouTube, Vimeo, and Dropbox

AI Subtitles

Boost your engagement by adding AI generated subtitles to your videos in 38 languages.

What's included:

90+% accuracy in five minutes or less

Available in 38 languages

Download caption files in all major formats

Interactive editor for easy collaboration

Automatically integrates with YouTube, Vimeo, Zoom, Dropbox, and Google Drive

FAQ for Transcripts, Captions, and Subtitles
--------------------------------------------

Yes, you can subscribe to VoiceHub to receive discounts on Human Transcription. As a paid subscriber, you can get discounts depending on what plan you subscribe to – 3% for those on the monthly Basic plan, 15% for those on the annual Basic plan, 5% for those on the monthly Pro plan, 30% for those on the annual Pro plan, and custom discounts for those on the Enterprise plan. Subscribe [here](https://www.rev.com/pricing).

We offer the following transcription formats: Microsoft Word (.docx), PDF (.pdf), Plain Text (.txt). When you order transcription, all of our transcription file formats are available to you at no additional cost.

We offer captions and subtitles in every major format, including but not limited to SubRip (.srt), Scenarist (.scc), MacCaption (.mcc), Timed Text (.ttml), Quicktime Timed Text (.qt.txt), Transcript (.txt), WebVTT (.vtt), DFXP (.dfxp), Cheetah .CAP (.cap), Spruce Subtitle File (.stl), Avid DS Subtitle File (.txt), Avid DVD Subtitle File (.txt), Scenarist 23.98 fps (.23p.scc), and burned-in captions.

Yes, we timestamp every new paragraph in a transcript for an additional $0.30 per minute. Your transcript is synced with audio, so you can click on any word and instantly hear that point in the audio—no scrubbing required.

We accept audio and video recordings in MP3, MP4, WMV, AIF, M4A, MOV, AVI, VOB, AMR, WMA, OGG, AAC, and WAV. We also accept streaming video and audio files available on the web, plus seamless integration with YouTube, Vimeo, Zoom, Dropbox, and other major apps.

The average turnaround time for Human Transcription and Human Captions for a 30-60 minute file is 12 hours. If you have a tight deadline, you may be interested in our Rush service that delivers your files back up to 5x faster. The average turnaround time for Global Subtitles for a 30-60 minute file is 96 hours.

‍

Subscription FAQ
----------------

No, you can cancel your subscription at any time without any penalty. Simply go to the “Manage Subscription” page to cancel your subscription. If you are on a shared account, only the Admin and Billing Manager can access this page. You can click on your name in the top right corner and select “Manage Subscription” from the dropdown menu to navigate to your Plan Management page. Here you can view the current details of your plan, change to a different plan, update your payment method, and cancel your paid subscription.

Yes. Entitlements within seat subscriptions are pooled at the account level. If an individual user goes over their allotted seat entitlements they simply start consuming from the account's pooled available entitlement.

Free and Basic subscribers can access [AI transcripts](https://www.rev.com/services/ai-transcription) as part of their monthly AI minutes. Pro and Enterprise subscribers can access both AI transcripts and AI captions as part of their monthly AI minutes. As a paid subscriber, you also get a discount on Human Transcription – 3% for those on the monthly Basic plan, 15% for those on the annual Basic plan, 5% for those on the monthly Pro plan, 30% for those on the annual Pro plan, and custom discounts for those on the Enterprise plan.

Whether you’re a content creator, a Fortune 500 company, or something in between, our speech-to-text solutions and subscription plans are priced for all.
